lead_paragraph: J. Randy Forbes, chairman of the House Armed Services Seapower and Projection Forces Subcommittee, takes issue with an Op-Ed article.

headline.main: Stop the ‘Decline of Our Navy,’ a Congressman Says
headline.print_headline: Stop the ‘Decline of Our Navy,’ a Congressman Says
